name: Frank E. HIRSCH, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner

parties: Frank E. HIRSCH, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of December, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The ■ order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED and the matter is REMANDED to that Court for further proceedings consistent with this Court’s opinion in Commonwealth, Dept, of Transportation, Bureau of Driver Licensing v. Scott, 546 Pa. 241, 684 A.2d 539 (1996).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
685 A.2d 1390
Frank E. HIRSCH, Respondent, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 30, 1996.
